mapper.sql: select report_data, time_period, pa_called_num, pa_call_len, pa_call_num, zj_called_num, zj_call_len, zj_call_num, total_called_num, total_call_len, total_call_num, user_group, login_name, user_name from t_lc_report_personal
mapper.select: select * from ( select (SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)) AS report_data,zz.user_group,zz.login_name,zz.user_name,'0-9' as time_period, MAX(zz.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num,MAX(zz.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len,MAX(zz.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, MAX(zz.zj_called_num) as zj_called_num,MAX(zz.zj_call_len) as zj_call_len,MAX(zz.zj_call_num) as zj_call_num, MAX(zz.total_called_num) as total_called_num,MAX(zz.total_call_len) as total_call_len,MAX(zz.total_call_num) as total_call_num from( SELECT CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.call_num END 'pa_call_num' , CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.call_num END 'zj_call_num', CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.call_len END 'pa_call_len', CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.call_len END 'zj_call_len', CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.called_num END 'pa_called_num', CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.called_num END 'zj_called_num', z.total_called_num, z.total_call_len, z.total_call_num, z.user_group, z.login_name, z.user_name from ( SELECT t1.user_group, t1.login_name, t1.user_name, t1.platform, t1.call_num, t1.create_by, t1.called_num, t1.call_len, t1.total_call_num, t1.total_call_len, t1.total_called_num FROM ( SELECT su.user_group, su.login_name, su.user_name, COUNT(1) AS call_num, re.platform, re.create_by, (SELECT COUNT(1) as qbbdcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by ) total_call_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) as thcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) called_num, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as thsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) call_len, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as qbthsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by) total_call_len, (SELECT COUNT(1) as qbthcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by) total_called_num FROM t_lc_call_record re,sys_user su WHERE re.create_by = su.user_id AND re.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND re.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') GROUP BY re.platform,re.create_by ) t1 ) z ) zz GROUP BY zz.login_name UNION ALL select (SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)) AS report_data,zz.user_group,zz.login_name,zz.user_name,'9-10' as time_period, MAX(zz.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num,MAX(zz.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len,MAX(zz.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, , CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.call_num END 'zj_call_num', CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.call_len END 'pa_call_len', CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.call_len END 'zj_call_len', CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.called_num END 'pa_called_num', CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.called_num END 'zj_called_num', z.total_called_num, z.total_call_len, z.total_call_num, z.user_group, z.login_name, z.user_name from ( SELECT t1.user_group, t1.login_name, t1.user_name, t1.platform, t1.call_num, t1.create_by, t1.called_num, t1.call_len, t1.total_call_num, t1.total_call_len, t1.total_called_num FROM ( SELECT su.user_group, su.login_name, su.user_name, COUNT(1) AS call_num, re.platform, re.create_by, (SELECT COUNT(1) as qbbdcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 20:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by ) total_call_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) as thcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 20:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) called_num, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as thsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 20:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) call_len, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as qbthsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 20:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by) total_call_len, (SELECT COUNT(1) as qbthcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 20:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by) total_called_num FROM t_lc_call_record re,sys_user su WHERE re.create_by = su.user_id and re.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 20:00:00') AND re.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') GROUP BY re.platform,re.create_by ) t1 ) z ) zz GROUP BY zz.login_name UNION ALL select (SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)) AS report_data,zz.user_group,zz.login_name,zz.user_name,'合计' as time_period, MAX(zz.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num,MAX(zz.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len,MAX(zz.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, MAX(zz.zj_called_num) as zj_called_num,MAX(zz.zj_call_len) as zj_call_len,MAX(zz.zj_call_num) as zj_call_num, MAX(zz.total_called_num) as total_called_num,MAX(zz.total_call_len) as total_call_len,MAX(zz.total_call_num) as total_call_num from( SELECT CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.call_num END 'pa_call_num' , CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.call_num END 'zj_call_num', CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.call_len END 'pa_call_len', CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.call_len END 'zj_call_len', CASE z.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN z.called_num END 'pa_called_num', CASE z.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN z.called_num END 'zj_called_num', z.total_called_num, z.total_call_len, z.total_call_num, z.user_group, z.login_name, z.user_name from ( SELECT t1.user_group, t1.login_name, t1.user_name, t1.platform, t1.call_num, t1.create_by, t1.called_num, t1.call_len, t1.total_call_num, t1.total_call_len, t1.total_called_num FROM ( SELECT su.user_group, su.login_name, su.user_name, COUNT(1) AS call_num, re.platform, re.create_by, (SELECT COUNT(1) as qbbdcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by ) total_call_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) as thcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) called_num, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as thsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) call_len, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as qbthsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by) total_call_len, (SELECT COUNT(1) as qbthcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.create_by) total_called_num FROM t_lc_call_record re,sys_user su WHERE re.create_by = su.user_id and re.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') AND re.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 23:59:59') GROUP BY re.platform,re.create_by ) t1 ) z ) zz GROUP BY zz.login_name ) tt ORDER BY tt.login_name
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lc_report_personal
report_data, time_period, pa_called_num, pa_call_len, pa_call_num, zj_called_num, zj_call_len, zj_call_num, total_called_num, total_call_len, total_call_num, user_group, login_name, user_name,
#{reportData}, #{timePeriod}, #{paCalledNum}, #{paCallLen}, #{paCallNum}, #{zjCalledNum}, #{zjCallLen}, #{zjCallNum}, #{totalCalledNum}, #{totalCallLen}, #{totalCallNum}, #{userGroup}, #{loginName}, #{userName},
